sentences.english: Such machines are called space rockets.
sentences.chinese: 这种机器就称为宇宙火箭。

sentences.english: GRBs come from some of the most energetic explosions known in the Universe.
sentences.chinese: GRBs来自宇宙中某些最高能量的爆炸。

sentences.english: The result is a universe that now looks like a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 结果是如今的宇宙看上去就像一块海绵。

sentences.english: The Soyuz spacecraft appears at the bottom left.
sentences.chinese: 联盟号宇宙飞船出现在图片的左下方。

sentences.english: Even if the whole universe are black, I would also like to use my face around to kindle.
sentences.chinese: 就算全宇宙都是黑色的，我也要用我的笑容燃亮四周。

sentences.english: B    God is the all powerful creator and sustainer of the Universe.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是宇宙间万能的创造者和支撑者。

sentences.english: The cosmos has solemn order and orbicular harmony.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙具有严整的秩序，圆满的和谐。

sentences.english: In the allness of the universe.
I try to make sense of my universe.
sentences.chinese: 我试着寻找我的宇宙的意义所在。

sentences.english: One possibility is that space is curved like a Pringle.
sentences.chinese: 我们的宇宙有可能漂浮在一个环形的空间里。

sentences.english: The puzzle of the cosmic age is a long-standing key problem in big bang cosmology.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙年龄是大爆炸宇宙学中的一个关键性的问题。

sentences.english: The puzzle of the cosmic age is a long-standing key problem in big bang cosmology.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙年龄是大爆炸宇宙学中的一个关键性的问题。

sentences.english: Genuine literature is but a sense of wonder at the universe and at human life.
sentences.chinese: 真正之文学不外是一种对宇宙及人生之惊奇感觉。

sentences.english: First, universalist view should be modified to be applied in different languages.
sentences.chinese: 首先，宇宙观无法被直接运用到不同型态的语言中。

sentences.english: All of this is done under the aegis of the creator God of this universe.
sentences.chinese: 那统统皆正在阿谁宇宙的制物神的保护下完秤弈。

sentences.english: Euclidean quantum gravity applies the superposition principle to the entire universe.
sentences.chinese: 欧氏量子重力将叠加原理套用到整个宇宙。

definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)
